c.e:
<>
						{selected ? (
							<SolaceSelectAutocomplete
								id="selectEventBrokerContext"
								name="selectEventBrokerContext"
								label={common.entityLabels.messagingService}
								value={selectedEventBroker}
								options={matchingEventBrokerOptions}
								itemComponent={getEventBrokerSelectAutocompleteItem}
								itemMappingCallback={(option) => option}
								optionsLabelCallback={getSolaceSelectAutocompleteOptionLabel}
								onChange={onChangeEventBroker}
								fetchOptionsCallback={inMemorySearchEventBrokersByName}
								isOptionEqualToValueCallback={isOptionEqualToValueCallback}
								getShowOptionDividerCallback={getShowSolaceSelectAutocompleteOptionDivider}
								groupByCallback={matchingEventBrokerOptions.some((option) => option.categoryHeading) ? getSolaceSelectAutocompleteGroupBy : undefined}
								showGroupDivider={true}
								readOnly={readOnlySelect}
								dataQa="selectEventBrokerContext"
							/>
						) : (
							brokersAvailableText
						)}
					</>
